title: Can't Redeem LoL Cards :(
body:
Yesterday I was redeeming cards and then it said that I couldn't redeem anymore. This is what it says "You have exceeded the maximum number of code redemption attempts at this time. Please wait and try again later."
I have waited a good 24 hours for this to fix and it still won't let me redeem my codes. I think I am glitched. Please help me.

replies.body:
It just means something was wrong with the card itself.
The only thing you can really do is find the reciept for your LoL cards and send them back to the store to get a new one.
And don't worry, you'll get a new one for free, as long as you have the receipt.

And if you don't, sorry but there is literally nothing you can do.
